title: Land for sale!
details:
Big land with a lot of opportunities for sale in Hiripitiya, 1 hour from Kurunegala. Peacful surroundings with a beautiful lake next to The land in a good neighbourhood.

The land has great potensial for building houses, appartments or buildings.

There are 30 coconut trees
Brick wall around The land with a gate
Electricity
CCT camera security
Light security
Well water
A little house is located on the land with two kitchens, two bedrooms and one bathroom.

Tamils, muslims and tourists are also welcome!

Contact for more info.
